authenticate(android.hardware.fingerprin.name: authenticate(android.hardware.fingerprint.FingerprintManager.CryptoObject,android.os.CancellationSignal,int,android.hardware.fingerprint.FingerprintManager.AuthenticationCallback,android.os.Handler)
authenticate(android.hardware.fingerprin.documentation:
Success or failure can be simulated with a subsequent call to {@link #authenticationSucceeds()}
or {@link #authenticationFails()}.

authenticationFails().name: authenticationFails()
authenticationFails().documentation:
Simulates a failed fingerprint authentication. An authentication request must have been
issued with {@link FingerprintManager#authenticate(CryptoObject, CancellationSignal, int, AuthenticationCallback, Handler)} and not cancelled.

authenticationSucceeds().name: authenticationSucceeds()
authenticationSucceeds().documentation:
Simulates a successful fingerprint authentication. An authentication request must have been
issued with {@link FingerprintManager#authenticate(CryptoObject, CancellationSignal, int, AuthenticationCallback, Handler)} and not cancelled.

getEnrolledFingerprints().name: getEnrolledFingerprints()
getEnrolledFingerprints().documentation: @return lists of current fingerprint items, the list be set via {@link #setDefaultFingerprints}

getFingerprintId(int).name: getFingerprintId(int)
getFingerprintId(int).documentation: @return Returns the finger ID for the given index.

hasEnrolledFingerprints().name: hasEnrolledFingerprints()
hasEnrolledFingerprints().documentation:
Returns {@code false} by default, or the value specified via
{@link #setHasEnrolledFingerprints(boolean)}.

isHardwareDetected().name: isHardwareDetected()
isHardwareDetected().documentation: @return false by default, or the value specified via {@link #setIsHardwareDetected(boolean)}

setDefaultFingerprints(int).name: setDefaultFingerprints(int)

setHasEnrolledFingerprints(boolean).name: setHasEnrolledFingerprints(boolean)
setHasEnrolledFingerprints(boolean).documentation:
Sets the return value of {@link FingerprintManager#hasEnrolledFingerprints()}.

@deprecated use {@link #setDefaultFingerprints} instead.

setIsHardwareDetected(boolean).name: setIsHardwareDetected(boolean)
setIsHardwareDetected(boolean).documentation: Sets the return value of {@link FingerprintManager#isHardwareDetected()}.
